TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {134273=28 July 2015, 135491=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 134784=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 209725=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015, 211033=Mahindra CIE is in the Castings & Forgings sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 8,627.16 crore. The company management includes Hemant Luthra - Chairman, K Ramaswami - Managing Director, Antonio Maria Pradera Jauregui - Director, Jesus Maria Herrera Barandiaran - Director, Zhooben Bhiwandiwala - Director, Daljit Mirchandani - Director, Jose Sabino Velasco Ibanez - Director, Manoj Maheshwari - Director, Dhananjay Mungale - Director, Pedro Echegaray - Additional Executive Director, Suhail A Nathani - Independent Director, Jose Ramon Berecibar Mutiozabal - Non Exe.Non Ind.Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532756 and the NSE with an NSE Code of MAHINDCIE. Its Registered office is at Mahindra Towers, P.K. Kurne Chowk,,Worli Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400018. Their Registrars are Karvy Computershare Private Ltd.}
